actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for loans for the establishment and/or construction of municipal, low-cost, nonprofit clinics for the spraying and neutering of dogs and cats.

summary.text: Provides for loans for the establishment and/or construction of municipal, low- cost, nonprofit clinics for the spaying and neutering of dogs and cats, to be dispersed by the Secretary of Health, Education and Welfare. Authorizes $1,000,000 to be appropriated to carry out the provisions of the Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for loans for the establishment and/or construction of municipal, low-cost, nonprofit clinics for the spraying and neutering of dogs and cats.
